heading: Lightâ€™s Refuge Dungeon Guide
content: Light's Refuge features easy mob types and a convoluted layout with multiple objectives. It is middle of the road for ease of farming, but not currently a possible . The Boss fight with 3 Knights is not difficult, with none of them having any annoying attacks. This dungeon unlocks the , a solid defensive aspect for Barbarians. Completing Light's Refuge is also essential for completing the Side Quest. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
